data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 354,300 souls in Yonne and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Yonne, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Yonne do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Yonne, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Yonne, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.

Father, I pray that the Jew, Swiss-speaking people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Jew, Swiss-speaking people know you.
Lord, teach the young people in the county of Yonne to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 4,353 believers in Yonne to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.section_summary:
the county of Yonne, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France has a population of 354,300.

We estimate Yonne has 4,353 people who might know Jesus, 216,662 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 133,285 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Yonne access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”
